name: Storms of Sansara
description:
Storms of Sansara, also known as S.O.S is a puzzle platformer created for the android platform.

S.O.S features a unique wind mechanic which allows players to manipulate the environment to their advantage.

Storms of Sansara was developed by a six-man team, Chaos.

Storms of Sansara was completed in mid 2021 and production took 5 months.
